means: 佩诺布斯科特河(美国缅因州中部河流，向南注入大西洋)
佩诺布斯科特人(居住在佩诺布斯科特河流域的印第安部落成员)

sentence.Network_en: The Algonquian language of the Penobscot, a dialect of Eastern Abenaki.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种东阿贝那基方言佩诺布斯科特语(指其使用的阿尔冈昆语 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 佩诺布斯科特河（The Penobscot River）以佩诺布斯科特（Penobscot）部落命名，那是一个美国印第安人部落，他们世代沿岸而生 …

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Algonquian people belonging to the Abnaki confederacy and living in the Penobscot valley in northern Maine
2. a river in central Maine flowing into Penobscot Bay

auth_sentence.content: Penobscot Bay at entrance to Rockland Harbor.

auth_sentence.content: In between, there are proposals for the Kennebec and Penobscot rivers.
